titleInfo.title: 'File 14/15 Money order and cash-on-delivery services between UK and the Gulf'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains letters from the Foreign Office, forwarded by the Political Residency at Bahrain to the Political Agent at Bahrain, regarding the introduction of money order and cash-on-delivery services between UK and the Gulf. This was allowed for the purpose of helping the Oil Companies and their personnel to send money to the UK.
